com.activities.am1

Class RegisterActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • com.activities.am1.RegisterActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class RegisterActivity
extends android.app.Activity
    LoginActivity Register a new user in the Auditorium system, pretending to seems as much as is possible to the web site. An user name, an email addres and password are needed. Created on January 8th, 2013
    Author:
    Bernardo Plaza

      • manageRegButton

        public void manageRegButton(android.view.View v)
        Called when RegButton is pressed first check if the email address seems to be a real one, then check if there is not any empty field finally sends the user information to the server and runs the activity ListQuestionActitivy

      • isValidEmail

        public static final boolean isValidEmail(java.lang.CharSequence target)
        Check if the email seems to be real such as xxx@xxx.x and don't use unallowed characters. Does not check if is really an existing email address!
